id_n.desc: Unique positive numeric identifier for filing unit

interest.desc: interest income from bank deposits, other deposits

rent.desc: rental income from letting out of buildings, property

sale_prop_dev.desc: income from sale of property by a developer

sale_prop.desc: income from sale of property by a non-developer individual

tax_cars.desc: tax from sale of car as entrepreneurial activity

tax_limitations.desc: tax from employees who do not submit detailed income from sources

dividends.desc: income from dividends received from companies

max_annual_income_low_ssc.desc: Maximum annual wage for low rate of social security contribution

max_annual_income_ssc.desc: Maximum annual wage (cap) for social security

base_social.desc: Base for calculation of social security

tti_rent_high.desc: Calculated taxable income from rent higher than 60mn AMD

tti_sale_prop_dev.desc: Calculated taxable income from sale of property by developers

tti_sale_prop.desc: Calculated taxable income from sale of property by other than developers

tti_stocks.desc: Calculated taxable income from sale of securities

tti_all.desc: Calculated taxable income from all sources except dividends

total_gross_income.desc: Calculated gross total income from all sources

pit_wages.desc: Calculated tax on income from wages

pit_royalty.desc: Calculated tax on income from interest

pit_interest.desc: Calculated tax on income from interest

pit_rent.desc: Calculated tax on income from wages

pit_rent_high.desc: Calculated tax on income from rent higher than AMD 60mn

pit_sale_prop.desc: Calculated tax on income from sale of property

pit_sale_prop_dev.desc: Calculated tax on income from sale of property by developer

pit_cars.desc: Calculated tax on income from sale of cars

pit_limitations.desc: Calculated tax on income from sale of cars

pit_stocks.desc: Calculated tax on income from sale of securities

pit_dividends.desc: Calculated tax on income from dividends

pitax.desc: Total tax on income with behavioral response

tti_wages_behavior.desc: Taxable income from wages under behavioral response

tti_c_royalty_behavior.desc: Taxable income from capital excluding dividends under behavioral response

tti_c_sale_stocks_behavior.desc: Taxable income from capital excluding dividends under behavioral response
